channel.title: Server IP
channel.description: ok so i downloaded Moparscape 3.1 or 3.2 whatever the latest one is. When i click log on it asks me for a server ip. it usually puts in 127.0.0.1, but when it does that i can't log on. I can log on on some another server, but then i can't teleport from place to place or change NPC's or items. Can someone please help me, so i can use the Commands!?

item.title: Server IP
item.dc:creator: @tigerman1373 tigerman1373
item.description:
@tigerman1373 wrote:

y get banned for using ::noclip? i mean whats the point of putting it on there if you cant use it?

If you go under “help” and scroll down to “commands” i wanted to know how to use those.

Read full topic

item.title: Server IP
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

It depends on what kind of commands you are trying to use. It also depends on if the server has commands. Most servers nowadays come with ::starter and ::yell [INSERT MESSAGE HERE]. Just try asking some people on the servers what some of the commands are. But be aware, there are some commands that will get you banned from servers like ::noclip <- Most well known command that almost every server has an autobanner for.

Read full topic

item.title: Server IP
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

to use some commands you have to be staff, there are commands for regular players.

Read full topic
